channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump delivers warning to Florida about the dangers of nixing school vaccine requirements
item.description: President Trump expressed skepticism over Florida's plan to end vaccine mandates for schoolchildren, which would make it the first state in the nation...

item.title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams says he won't quit the race and is the only one who can beat Mamdani
item.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams said Friday that he won't succumb to pressure to end his reelection campaign and insisted he is the only candidate stro...

item.title: Lawfare and Constant Emergencies Put the Judiciary at Risk
item.description: A year of peril lies ahead for the federal courts.

item.title: Trump says his Mimai golf resort will host the 2026 G20 summit
item.description: President Trump said next year's Group of 20 summit will be held at his Trump National Doral Miami golf resort.

item.title: Maine’s ‘Reckless’ Secretary Of State Admits ‘Some’ Noncitizens Are On State’s Voter Rolls
item.description: Shenna Bellows, who has parlayed her activist brand of Trump Derangement Syndrome into a run for governor, refuses to open up voter files.

item.title: Dearborn Heights’ Arabic Police Patch Snafu Is A Badge Of Surrender

item.title: How Phonics Instruction Helped Indiana Kids Read Better Than Many Adults
item.description: Sixth in the nation, Indiana invested heavily in literacy and requires training in science of reading methods to teach children to read.

item.title: Trump names Portland as another out-of-control city in need of National Guard troops
item.description: President Trump now has his eye on Portland, Oregon, as another city where he could send in the National Guard to help fight crime.

item.title: Tim Kaine Is an Ignoramus
item.description: Is it too much to ask that a U.S. senator know a little bit about our heritage?

item.title: How Can the White House, Congress, and Others Repair Damaged Trust in Official Statistics?
item.description: Without independence from political control, official statistics lack credibility and value.

item.title: The Week: Trump Loses on Tariffs, Again

item.title: The International Press Has Exhausted All Credibility on Israel
item.description: The fabricated death of a Palestinian boy is only the latest offense.
